```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(PairedData)
```

```{r levene.var.test, cache = TRUE}

z<-rnorm(20)
x<-rnorm(20)+z
y<-(rnorm(20)+z)*2
levene.var.test(x,y)

# Some variations
levene.var.test(x,y,tr=0.2)
levene.var.test(x,y,location="median")


data(anscombe2)
p<-with(anscombe2,paired(X2,Y2))
levene.var.test(p)






```
